t: Ord. No. 2025-01. AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON TO REPEAL AND REPLACE CHAPTER 12.04.051 "SKATEPARK USE" TO THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE

c.x: For the purpose of this section, the term "skatepark" means the designated
This section does not apply to any duly authorized City employees.
Any person who violates this section is guilty of an infraction and upon co
The City of American Canyon reserves the right to eject anyone from the ska
The skatepark is open daily from sunrise to sunset unless otherwise posted.
Anyone under the age of 14 must be accompanied by a parent or guardian.
No camping or overnight or extended use.
No loitering or trespassing.
Disorderly conduct, excessive noise, rioting, or any actions that disturb t
No person shall ride a skateboard or inline skate in the skatepark except w
No person shall use the skatepark for any purpose other than skateboarding.
Unauthorized ramps, jumps, equipment or obstacles may not be brought to the
Fighting, intimidation, hazing, abusive/foul/offensive language and behavio
Keep food and drink off the skating surface and ramps.
The use of drugs, alcohol, or being under the influence of such substances
The use of tobacco products is strictly prohibited, including but not limit
No glass, stones, or similar items in or around the skating area.
No fires or barbeques.
No amplified music without prior approval from the City of American Canyon.
Animals are not permitted within the skatepark.
Organized events, commercialized lessons, and contests require express writ
Vendors are prohibited unless approved by the City of American Canyon.
Dispose of trash into designated trash receptacles.
No graffiti or tagging.
Activity is not permitted when the surface is wet or icy.
